page.title: 01THE AREA OF STUDY
page.content: The 12 square kilometres that comprise the block that we have studied is situated on the eastern side of Brighton. It comprises four quite distinct regions: 1) The Downs 2) Woodingdean Village.(North) 3) N.Brighton(Moulsecoomb & Bevendean) 4) Central & East Brighton (Whitehawk) Three schools have been involved in the project:{Whitehawk Middle School} {Bevendean First School {Woodingdean Middle School The topography of the area is Down Land with the valleys being filled with the housing,shops and industry. Most of the development of the central area took place from about 1800 and the estates from the 1920's onwards.
